test_data_merge_move module¶

class test_data_merge_move.TestClean¶

Bases: object

This class contains all unit tests relating to the clean function.

Methods

test_clean_neg()

Tests whether the dataframes with negative binding observations are cleaned as expected.

test_clean_pos()

Tests whether the dataframes with positive binding observations are cleaned as expected.
test_clean_neg()¶

Tests whether the dataframes with negative binding observations are cleaned as expected.

test_clean_pos()¶

Tests whether the dataframes with positive binding observations are cleaned as expected.

class test_data_merge_move.TestJoin¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the join function.

Methods

test_join()

Takes in two dataframes and joins them together.
test_join()¶

Takes in two dataframes and joins them together.

Notes

Equality checking ignores datatype matching.

class test_data_merge_move.TestMerge¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the merge function.

Methods

test_merge_batch()

Testing overall functionality.

test_merge_book()

Testing overall functionality.
test_merge_batch()¶

Testing overall functionality. Takes all Excel sheets from src_path and moves to dst_path, from which the function concatenates all sheets together into one Dataframe.

Notes

Equality checking ignores datatype matching.

test_merge_book()¶

Testing overall functionality. Takes all Excel sheets from src_path and moves to dst_path, from which the function concatenates all sheets together into one Dataframe.

Notes

Equality checking ignores datatype matching.

class test_data_merge_move.TestMove¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the move function.

Methods

test_move()

Testing overall functionality, this function takes files from src_path and moves them to dst_path.
test_move()¶

Testing overall functionality, this function takes files from src_path and moves them to dst_path. The function then asserts whether the files exist in dst_path, subsequently removing the files as part of teardown.

class test_data_merge_move.TestReformat¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the reformt functions.

Methods

test_reformat_neg()

Takes in a list of dataframes containing negative binding data, concatenates them, and returns the reformatted dataframe.

test_reformat_pos()

Takes in a list of dataframes containing positive binding data, concatenates them, and returns the reformatted dataframe.
test_reformat_neg()¶

Takes in a list of dataframes containing negative binding data, concatenates them, and returns the reformatted dataframe.

test_reformat_pos()¶

Takes in a list of dataframes containing positive binding data, concatenates them, and returns the reformatted dataframe.
